message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. After considering its value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
